descriptions:
['Description- Arabian Villa
- 2 bedroom + Maids
- Back to Back
- Private garden
- District 8
- Walking distance to Arcadia School
- Fully landscaped
- Call Cathal +971505980269
haus & haus is pleased to bring to the market this 2 bedroom plus maid independent Arabian style villa in District 8. The property enjoys a large 2,690 sq.ft built up area and a vast 6,800sq.ft plus plot size.
There is covered car parking space and room outside the unit for visitors. It is also located a 2 minute drive from nearby supermarkets such as Spinneys and Carrefour.
This particular unit is available now, presented in immaculate condition and within walking distance to Arcadia School.
Call Cathal (BRN: 40841) on +971505980269 for more information, to arrange a viewing or to make an offer.
Finance is available on this property through haus & haus partners. Please speak to us for more information.
For further details or to arrange viewings, please contact our Head Office on +97143025800, alternatively visit our website www.hausandhaus.com where you will find our full selection of properties available both for sale and rent.']

['DescriptionRealty Force Real Estate is pleased to offer this luxurious 3 bed apartment in Burj Vista Tower 1

The new residential project is differentiated by its luxury residences with lavish terraces that open to uninterrupted views of the city’s skyline, The Dubai Fountain, and the wider Downtown Dubai neighbourhood. The spacious front terraces wrap around in a distinct staggered honeycomb pattern, a modern marvel in urban architecture.The apartment consists of a large open plan living and dining area with floor to ceiling windows and access to the balcony. Amazing planned modern kitchen including Meile appliances. There is 1 spacious bedroom both with en-suite bath and built-in wardrobes

Mayfair Tower has been conceptualized to be a blend of luxury and functionality, which is primarily located in a new commercial district of Dubai, Business Bay, a place where the vivacious buzz of business is just in close proximity.
It is a mid rise residential building with a prime location because it is so close to Dubai Historical Creek and offers you an option to choose from well designed apartments ranging from one to two bedroom units. Most of them have breathtaking and scenic views of the aforementioned creek as well as the unhindered vistas of adjoining landscaped area.
This project is considered as a style of living where you can be at the center of action because of its being accessible to everything, including Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai Metro Station, Al Khail Road, and some branded cafes and Restaurants.']
